    @allure.step("Start test of button [Try demo] on Main banner")
    @pytest.mark.test_02
    def test_02_main_banner_try_demo_button(self, worker_id, d,
                                            cur_language, cur_country, cur_role, cur_login, cur_password):
        """
        Check: Button [Try demo] on Main banner
        Language: All. License: All.
        """
        global cur_page_url
    
        bid = build_dynamic_arg_v4(
            d, worker_id, cur_language, cur_country, cur_role,
            "11.02.04", "Education > Menu item [Forex trading]",
            ".00_02", "Testing button [Try demo] on Main banner")
    
        Common().check_language_in_list_and_skip_if_not_present(
            cur_language, ["", "ar", "de", "es", "fr", "it", "cn", "ru", "zh"])
    
        page_conditions = Conditions(d, "")
        main_page_link = page_conditions.preconditions(
            d, CapitalComPageSrc.URL, "", cur_language, cur_country, cur_role, cur_login, cur_password)
    
        page_menu = MenuSection(d, main_page_link)
        cur_page_url = page_menu.open_education_forex_trading_menu(d, cur_language, main_page_link)
    
        test_element = MainBannerTryDemo(d, cur_page_url)

    @allure.step('Checking that "Login" form or page opened')
    def assert_login(self, d, cur_language, cur_link):
        """Method Assert Login form or page"""
        print(f"\n{datetime.now()}   3. Assert_Login_v0")
        self.page_signup_login = SignupLogin(d, cur_link)
        if self.page_signup_login.should_be_login_form():

        elif self.page_signup_login.should_be_login_page():

            del self.page_signup_login
